attributes.action: Bring the Don Bemrose Trophy cup final back to Queensgate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is a petition for the Driffield and District football league to bring the Don Bemrose trophy cup final back to the Queensgate Stadium in Bridlington , Don Bemrose is a Bridlington Town man and it is only right that his trophy final should be played in a place that means so much to Mr Bemrose

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
